resources.string: The word you are looking for was not found. Try spelling the word differently or check if the correct language is selected.
A request to the server could not be made. This is most likely caused because of your internet connection.
Type a word to search for it

"Search for a word to find its meaning\n\nTap the search icon on the toolbar above to start searching. You can also choose which language you want to look for words in. The app defaults to Hindi if no language has been selected."
